Title: Thin crowds at ghats in eastern Krishna
Content: : Several ghats across the Eastern Krishna district wore a deserted look, owing to the presence of seawater in them.Just about 1,000 pilgrims had visited the two ghats at Campbell aqueduct by afternoo
Author: T. Appala Naidu
